Package com.g1.mychess.match.service.impl

Class Glicko2RatingServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
com.g1.mychess.match.service.impl.Glicko2RatingServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
Glicko2RatingService
@Service public class Glicko2RatingServiceImpl extends Object implements Glicko2RatingService
This service class implements the Glicko-2 rating system to calculate new player ratings after a match. It applies the Glicko-2 algorithm, which adjusts the player's rating based on the results of their games and the ratings of their opponents.

  • Method Details

    • calculatePlayerRatings

      public PlayerRatingUpdateDTO calculatePlayerRatings(MatchPlayer player, List<MatchPlayer> opponents, double[] result)
      Calculates the updated player ratings using the Glicko-2 system.
      Specified by:
      calculatePlayerRatings in interface Glicko2RatingService
      Parameters:
      player - The player whose rating is being calculated.
      opponents - List of the player's opponents in the match.
      result - An array of results where 1.0 is a win, 0.5 is a draw, and 0.0 is a loss.
      Returns:
      A DTO containing the updated player rating, rating deviation, and volatility.

    • calculate_g

      public static double calculate_g(double RD)
      Calculates the "g" function used in the Glicko-2 system, which scales the rating deviation.
      Parameters:
      RD - The rating deviation of the player.
      Returns:
      The value of "g(RD)".

    • calculate_E

      public static double calculate_E(double R, double Rj, double RDj)
      Calculates the expected probability of the player winning against an opponent.
      Parameters:
      R - The rating of the player.
      Rj - The rating of the opponent.
      RDj - The rating deviation of the opponent.
      Returns:
      The expected probability of the player winning.

    • calculate_v

      public static double calculate_v(double R, double[] opponents_rating, double[] opponents_RD)
      Calculates the "v" function, which represents the total variance for a set of opponents.
      Parameters:
      R - The rating of the player.
      opponents_rating - The ratings of the opponents.
      opponents_RD - The rating deviations of the opponents.
      Returns:
      The calculated value of "v".

    • calculate_delta

      public static double calculate_delta(double R, double[] opponents_rating, double[] opponents_RD, double[] results)
      Calculates the delta, which is the difference between the current and expected ratings, weighted by the variance.
      Parameters:
      R - The rating of the player.
      opponents_rating - The ratings of the opponents.
      opponents_RD - The rating deviations of the opponents.
      results - The results of the match (1.0 for win, 0.5 for draw, 0.0 for loss).
      Returns:
      The calculated delta.

    • calculate_function

      public static double calculate_function(double x, double delta_squared, double RD_squared, double v, double A)
      A helper function used in the calculation of volatility. It models the relationship between the volatility, rating deviation, and variance.
      Parameters:
      x - The current volatility guess.
      delta_squared - The squared delta value.
      RD_squared - The squared rating deviation.
      v - The total variance.
      A - The initial guess for the volatility.
      Returns:
      The result of the function.

    • calculate_volatility

      public static double calculate_volatility(double RD, double volatility, double v, double delta_squared)
      Calculates the volatility of a player's rating, which measures the degree of uncertainty in the player's performance.
      Parameters:
      RD - The rating deviation of the player.
      volatility - The current volatility of the player.
      v - The total variance.
      delta_squared - The squared delta value.
      Returns:
      The updated volatility.
